ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Core on every hero. Do not get caught without a TP Scroll.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: If the enemy team has more carries than casters consider getting a Sheepstick instead of Orchid. Do not get both Orchid AND Sheepstick.
ItemTooltips.orchid: The mana regen is a great help, and with this you can solo gank enemies that are caught alone. I
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: If you are being disabled get this before picking up your MKB.
ItemTooltips.rapier: Clinkz is a great Divine Rapier holder, but do not get this if they can perma-stun you to death.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: The increased damage is amazing, this also helps you take down towers without being on high ground.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Your increased attack speed synergises well with Daedlus.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: If the enemy team is pushing hard using heroes like Natures Prophet, Engima, Broodmother, etc. then pick up a Mjollnir to clear the creep waves.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: If you are farming exceptionally well then skip this and proceed straight to Orchid.

AbilityTooltips.clinkz_strafe:
Use this when focusing down an enemy hero or Tower.

Use it after a teamfight has started to get its full use.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_searing_arrows: After Orchid turn this on Auto Cast.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_wind_walk: Get 1 level early to avoid ganks and escape. Later levels allow you to move at maximum movement speed.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_death_pact: Look for the largest creep (Creep with most HP) in the jungle and eat it. This provides you with a lot of damage and HP. Use it before every gank and before teamfights.
